Material used.Material Source: Cultured SN dopaminergic neurons from PINK1 knockout mice
Material used.Description: The experiment was conducted using cultured SN dopaminergic neurons prepared from PINK1 knockout mice.

Readout description.Result Description: Mitochondrial membrane potential was depolarized in PINK1-null SN dopaminergic cells.
Mitochondrial membrane potential was severely depolarized in PINK1-null SN dopaminergic cells.
Mitochondrial membrane potential was depolarized in PINK1-null SN dopaminergic cells.

Biological replicates.Description: Multiple biological replicates were performed to confirm the results.

Technical replicates.Description: No technical replicates were reported in the literature.

Basic positive control.Description: Wild-type cDNA was used as a positive control to verify the assay's functionality.

Basic negative control.Description: Empty vector was used as a negative control to confirm the assay's specificity.

Statistical analysis method.Statistical analysis method: Student's t-test was used to compare the results between wild-type and PINK1-null SN dopaminergic cells.

Threshold for normal readout.Threshold for normal readout: Mitochondrial membrane potential above 80% of wild-type levels.

Threshold for abnormal readout.Threshold for abnormal readout: Mitochondrial membrane potential below 50% of wild-type levels.
